summary: Let's lay it right on the line. Bigotry and racism are among the deadliest social ills plaguing the world today. But, unlike a...
body:
Let’s lay it right on the line. Bigotry and racism are among the deadliest social ills plaguing the world today. But, unlike a team of costumed super-villains, they can’t be halted with a punch in the snoot, or a zap from a ray gun. The only way to destroy them is to expose them—to reveal them for the insidious evils they really are. 

Stan Lee

The only way to destroy them is to expose them—to reveal them for the insidious evils they really are. 

Stan Lee

summary:
Some heroes wear capes and masks,
Some wear lap coats and scrubs,
Some fight overseas or defend at home,
And some inspire...
body:
Some heroes wear capes and masks,

Some wear lap coats and scrubs,

Some fight overseas or defend at home,

And some inspire generations of kids and adults

Rest in Peace Mr. Lee and thank you for creating my childhood.

reblog.comment:

summary: I wasn’t a part of the marvel fandom until recently but even in that short time, I looked up to you countless times. With the...
body:
I wasn’t a part of the marvel fandom until recently but even in that short time, I looked up to you countless times. With the heroes, the worlds, the magic you created, you become the inspiration for millions of people like me.

Rest In Peace, Stan Lee

reblog.comment:
I wasn’t a part of the marvel fandom until recently but even in that short time, I looked up to you countless times. With the heroes, the worlds, the magic you created, you become the inspiration for millions of people like me.

Rest In Peace, Stan Lee

trail.content_raw:
I wasn’t a part of the marvel fandom until recently but even in that short time, I looked up to you countless times. With the heroes, the worlds, the magic you created, you become the inspiration for millions of people like me.

Rest In Peace, Stan Lee
trail.content:
I wasn’t a part of the marvel fandom until recently but even in that short time, I looked up to you countless times. With the heroes, the worlds, the magic you created, you become the inspiration for millions of people like me.

Rest In Peace, Stan Lee

blog.description:
“Your body is not a temple. It’s an amusement park. Enjoy the ride.”

- Anthony Bourdain

body:
Thank You Stan Lee

I think we all saw it coming. Especially after Joan died, it seemed inevitable. But this man helped create characters and places that has touched so many people. He changed lives with his imagination. Or least he changed mine. He made me a geek. A damn good one too. And I have no doubt in my mind that his creations will live on for many more generations. It’s just, I somehow thought he would to.

reblog.comment:

It’s just, I somehow thought he would to.

summary:
Alex would like you all to know that, unlike many sources seem to be claiming, he didn't work on 'Detective Pikachu'.
He did...
body:
Alex would like you all to know that, unlike many sources seem to be claiming, he didn’t work on ’Detective Pikachu’.

He did write a bit of the script of ’Spider-Man: Into the Spider Verse’ though. 😉 (Which is amazing; I’m already excited for it; the animations look rad! 😍)

If you haven’t watched the trailer for ’Into the Spider Verse’ yet, you totally should! Check it out here! 😄 🕷️

summary: “I used to be embarrassed because I was just a comic-book writer while other people were building bridges or going on to medical...
body:
“I used to be embarrassed because I was just a comic-book writer while other people were building bridges or going on to medical careers. And then I began to realize: entertainment is one of the most important things in people’s lives. Without it they might go off the deep end. I feel that if you’re able to entertain people, you’re doing a good thing.”

~ Stan Lee , December 28 1922 - November 12 2018

Excelsior!
